tool.name: NGSfilter
tool.description: Assigns sequence records to the corresponding experiment/sample based on DNA tags and primers

param.name: inputextrafile
param.label: Parameter file
param.help: extrafile describing the DNA tags and primers sequences used for each sample

param.name: inputfastq
param.label: Read from file
param.help: file of Illumina pair-end reads assembled by illuminapairedend

param.name: mismatch
param.label: Number of errors allowed for matching primers (default = 2)

param.name: bool
param.label: Do you want to generate a file with unidentified sequences?
